name: Soul of Seasons
description:
**POST-JAM VERSION**

Originally made for Ludum Dare Jam 51 in 48 hours!

When the Soul of Seasons is shattered during a storm, the forest is thrown into chaos as the seasons shift between every ten seconds. Play as a dryad named Ivy to find all four shards of the Soul and restore balance to the forest. Carefully observe the world around you–the path forward may be hidden, waiting to be revealed when the next season arrives.

Controls: Use the left and right arrow keys to move and press the space bar to jump. Once you collect a season fragment, press Z during that season to skip it.
